import { useState } from 'react' import './Search.css' const Search = (prps) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const changeCity = () => { prps.city(title) setTitle('') } return (
setTitle(event.target.value)} value={title} type="text" className="search-bar" placeholder="Search" />
) } export default Search
